languages.text: Мерзавец не оценил вашего милосердия. Стоило блюстителям расковать его, как он немедленно напал на охранников. В результате короткой схватки его мозги и тайны, хранившиеся в них, оказались размазаны по переборке.

traits.locale_text: Мерзавец не оценил вашего милосердия. Стоило блюстителям расковать его, как он немедленно напал на охранников. В результате короткой схватки его мозги и тайны, хранившиеся в них, оказались размазаны по переборке.

languages.text: The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.
languages.original_text: Мерзавец не оценил вашего милосердия. Стоило блюстителям расковать его, как он немедленно напал на охранников. В результате короткой схватки его мозги и тайны, хранившиеся в них, оказались размазаны по переборке.

traits.locale_text: The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

languages.text: 那个混蛋并没有感激你的仁慈，他刚刚挣脱枷锁，就径直向警卫扑去。在随后的混战中，他的脑袋被一枪打爆，脑浆与其中隐藏的秘密都糊到了舱壁上。
languages.original_text: The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

traits.locale_text: 那个混蛋并没有感激你的仁慈，他刚刚挣脱枷锁，就径直向警卫扑去。在随后的混战中，他的脑袋被一枪打爆，脑浆与其中隐藏的秘密都糊到了舱壁上。

languages.text: あのロクデナシは慈悲に感謝することはなかった。彼は鎖を解かれるやいなや、衛兵に向かって身を投げた。もみあいの末、彼の脳みそと秘密が隔壁に飛び散った。
languages.original_text: The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

traits.locale_text: あのロクデナシは慈悲に感謝することはなかった。彼は鎖を解かれるやいなや、衛兵に向かって身を投げた。もみあいの末、彼の脳みそと秘密が隔壁に飛び散った。

languages.text: El desgraciado no apreció la misericordia. Se lanzó contra los guardias en cuanto lo desencadenaron. En la refriega que se produjo, tanto sus sesos como los secretos que ocultaban salpicaron un muro.
languages.original_text: The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

traits.locale_text: El desgraciado no apreció la misericordia. Se lanzó contra los guardias en cuanto lo desencadenaron. En la refriega que se produjo, tanto sus sesos como los secretos que ocultaban salpicaron un muro.

languages.text: Der Bastard wusste diese Gnade nicht zu schätzen. Er warf sich auf die Wachen, sobald seine Ketten gelöst waren. In dem Kampf, der darauf entstand, wurden sowohl sein Gehirn als auch die darin enthaltenen Geheimnisse an der Wand verteilt.
languages.original_text: The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

traits.locale_text: Der Bastard wusste diese Gnade nicht zu schätzen. Er warf sich auf die Wachen, sobald seine Ketten gelöst waren. In dem Kampf, der darauf entstand, wurden sowohl sein Gehirn als auch die darin enthaltenen Geheimnisse an der Wand verteilt.

languages.text: À peine délivré de ses chaînes, le misérable insensible à votre magnanimité se jette sur les gardes. Au cours de l'algarade qui s'ensuit, sa cervelle et les secrets qu'elle recelait se retrouvent éparpillés sur une cloison proche.
languages.original_text: The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.

traits.locale_text: À peine délivré de ses chaînes, le misérable insensible à votre magnanimité se jette sur les gardes. Au cours de l'algarade qui s'ensuit, sa cervelle et les secrets qu'elle recelait se retrouvent éparpillés sur une cloison proche.

languages.text: Şerefsiz herif merhametinin değerini bilmedi. Zincirlerden çıkar çıkmaz kendini muhafızların üzerine attı. Çıkan arbedede beyninin pekmezinin akıtılmasıyla tüm sırları da kayboldu.
languages.original_text: The bastard did not appreciate your mercy. He threw himself at the guards as soon as he was unchained. In the resulting scuffle, both his brains and the secrets they concealed were splattered across a bulkhead.
